name: AFTERSHOCK (itch) (Insignia Interactive)
description:
AFTERSHOCK is a first person movement shooter that attempts to mirror PlayStation 1 graphics. 

You play as a soldier attacking a research facility on a remote island. Jump in with up to 5 other players and battle it out to find the movement GOD.

*Disclaimer* 

This game is far from a finished product, it's unpolished, riddled with bugs, and largely untextured. We are uncertain on the future of this project, but please leave us feedback if you like the concept.
